title: Crayon Shin-chan Movie 24: Bakusui! Yumemi World Dai Totsugeki
title_english: Crayon Shin-chan: Fast Asleep! The Great Assault on the Dreaming World!
title_japanese: 映画クレヨンしんちゃん 爆睡! ユメミーワールド大突撃
synopsis: A story set in the dream world, depicting the Kasukabe Defense Forces and the Nohara Family fighting against a nightmare trouble. One day the people in Kasukabe come to be able to have dreams they want in their sleep, after having a strange dream in which a giant fish swallows them. The people enjoy having their own distinctive dream in the dream world, but the world gradually changes into a nightmare world. Shinnosuke Nohara and Kasukabe Defense Forces members let Saki Nubatama, a girl who moves in Kasukabe, join the group, and they go into the dream world to explore the cause of the nightmare. (Source: Manabu Tsuribe)

Prequel.name: Crayon Shin-chan Movie 23: Ora no Hikkoshi Monogatari - Saboten Daisuugeki

Sequel.name: Crayon Shin-chan Movie 25: Shin-chan Shuurai! Uchuujin Shiriri

opening_themes: "Kimi ni 100 Percent (キミに100パーセント)" by Kyary Pamyu Pamyu
ending_themes: "Tomo yo ~ Kono saki mo zutto... (友よ 〜 この先もずっと…)" by Ketsumeishi
